sentences.sContent: Have you got any spare boxes?
You could sleep in the spare bedroom.
sentences.sCn: 你可以睡那间空着的客房。

sentences.sContent: Do you have any spare cash?
I’ll go and see if there are any spare seats.
sentences.sCn: 我去看看是否还有空余的座位。

sentences.sContent: A decline in beer sales had left the industry with spare capacity (= the ability to produce more than can be sold ) .
sentences.sCn: 啤酒销售量的下降使该行业出现产能闲置。

sentences.sContent: ...And it is not just individuals: the web makes it easier for companies to rent out spare offices and idle machines...
...but it won't even get them out of the spare bedroom at Mom and Dad's...
...The results of a Harry’s pool showed that reading was the most popular spare time activity in the US...
...correct spelling is so important that both students and the teachers should spare no efforts to achieve correct spelling...

synos.tran: 节约，吝惜；饶恕；分出，分让

phrases.pCn: 不遗余力；抽出；宽容；节省
在他闲暇的时候；在他业余时间里
备用容量；闲置的生产能力

words.tran: 抽出；宽恕；免去；给予（spare的ing形式）

trans.tranOther: not being used or not needed at the present time
